Text: Stoke City Football Club is an English football club based in Stoke-on-Trent, Staffordshire.

Text: Stoke City F.C. in European football:  They played in the UEFA Cup in 1972–73 and 1974–75, before qualifying for the tournament in 2011–12 under the new name of UEFA Europa League.
